text: Euparyphasma is a genus of moths belonging to the subfamily Thyatirinae of the Drepanidae. It was described by David Stephen Fletcher in 1979. ==Species== * Euparyphasma albibasis Hampson, 1893 * Euparyphasma obscura Sick, 1941 * Euparyphasma maxima Leech, 1888 ==Former species== * Euparyphasma cinereofusca Houlbert, 1921 ==References== Category:Thyatirinae Category:Drepanidae genera
title: Euparyphasma
